clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text: You may opt-out of having your location data collected by Yello at any time

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right, at our discretion, to change, modify, add, or remove portions of this Privacy Policy at any time

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: through the use of cookies, web beacons, pixels, and other technologies

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: Please note that the level of legal protection provided in the United States from which you may access our Sites may not be as stringent as that under privacy standards or the privacy laws of other countries

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text: using Global Positioning System (GPS)

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We may disclose personal information to our vendors and other third-party service providers

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: information about individuals in the United States, or we may transfer it to, and store it within, other countries

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: Customers may access, update, correct, and/or delete registration and other personal information

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: If you are a California resident, pursuant to the California Consumer Protection Act (CCPA), you have the right to request

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: If you are located in the EU, you have certain rights under EU data protection law with respect to your personal data

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: Customers may also close their account at any time

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: We have implemented commercially reasonable, appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the confidentiality, security and integrity of data stored

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective Date: August 20, 2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Please note that by disabling or deleting cookies, you may not be able to access the full

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service
clauses.clause_text: only those employees and third parties who need access to personal information in order to perform their duties are allowed such access

case.text: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service

clauses.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.
clauses.clause_text: We urge you to read the privacy policies of other websites

case.text: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We may also disclose aggregated, de-identified information

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: IP addresses and browser information

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: We may receive information about Candidates and Customers from our third-party service providers

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: Do Not Track (“DNT”) signals, we do not respond to them at this time

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
